#include <cmath>
#include <iomanip>
#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
using namespace std;

struct Point {
    int x, y;

    Point(int x = 0, int y = 0) :
        x(x), y(y)
    {
    }
};

double polygon_area(vector<Point> &points);

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin >> t;

    while (t --> 0) {
        int n;
        cin >> n;

        vector<Point> points;

        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
            Point p;
            cin >> p.x;

            points.push_back(p);
        }

        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
            int y;
            cin >> y;

            points[i].y = y;
        }

        cout << fixed << setprecision(1) << polygon_area(points) << endl;
    }

    return 0;
}

double polygon_area(vector<Point> &points) {
    double area = 0;
    int s = (int) points.size();

    for (int i = 0; i < s; i++) {
        area += (points[i].x + points[(i + 1) % s].x) * (points[i].y - points[(i + 1) % s].y);
    }

    cout << endl;

    return abs(area) / 2;
}
